title: [Question] Deloitte test questions.
content: Today my friend is having the test for Deloitte, so he's confused what to study. So can anyone help with what questions are asked or what to prepare?

comments.body: It will be mostly Aptitude and Quantitative only. Its not that hard to do tbh. Also, Deloitte USI or Deloitte India?
Only 1 profile for usi rest for india that too in some profiles full time joining is in 2027 after whole 2026 as an intern
Ahh, mostly it will be 6 months internship from Aug - Dec 2026 or something & then 2027 onwards FTE
It's some virtual internship from Jan to june then from July to dec another internshipÂ
